author: Mariana
title: Great Deal in Bosques de Doña Rosa, Cariari, For Sale
text:

Price: $325,000 Province: Heredia
Cantón: Heredia
Construction: 387m2
Land: 500m2
Bedrooms: 4
Bathrooms: 3
This is home is located in one of the best upscale neighborhoods of Heredia, Bosques de Doña Rosa, Cuidad Cariari. Located close to fine restaurants, international shopping, the best private schools, the airport and most international corporate centers, this property presents a great investment.
This very well priced home has four bedrooms, three bathrooms, a maids quarters will a full bathroom, a separate guest house, a pool, great mountain views, granite counter top. The home was recently remodeled in 2011.
Owner financing available for qualified buyers.
See this and other listings in the new Tico Times Real Estate section here.
COD: 1-494
Email: realestate@ticotimes.net
Phone: +(506) 2258-1558
